content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Submission to the Archive of Formal Proofs has become even easier!
We are proud to announce the availability of an online submission system:
https://ci.isabelle.systems/afp-submission/
Please submit your articles via that web page. It collects the necessary
information and runs your submission. See also
http://afp.sourceforge.net/submitting.shtml.

Happy submitting!
Tobias

PS Thanks to Max Haslbeck, Johannes HÃ¶lzl and Lars Hupel for the design and
implementation.
smime.p7s
